Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2012 05:01AM Blondvoyage1 wrote: Yes get an ultrasound or MRI. If I had done it, I wouldnt be fighting for my life now. I had bi-rads 3, no palbable mass, but dense breasts, so the 6 month follow up by mammo showed nothing because breasts were so dense. I didn't know that before my diagnosis, nor that I should have insisted on an ultrasound.
Posts.Title: Bi-Rad 3. Do I need an Ultrasound? sjvg Beesie
